data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during VULTURE cruise from Cape St Vincent to Lisbon started at 1763-12-12

Ship: Vulture (Sloop), Voyage: Cape St Vincent - Lisbon, 1st Observer: Charles Hudson (Captain), 2nd Observer: Francis Parry (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 10G 267BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
